== Introduction ==
This page outlines the layout of the Xubuntu wiki, and provides summaries of included page content.  While it may not seem necessary to provide this information considering the handy menu bar at the top of each page, defining the wiki's structure should help wiki contributors maintain consistency when adding new content.   

<pre>
The latter portions of this page a are WIP.
</pre>

== Primary Wiki Pages ==
Some of the links in the wiki menu bar direct users to the Xubuntu website, which is not part of the Xubuntu wiki.  The ''internal'' wiki pages currently include:
=== Headquarters ===
* Roadmap - 
* Leaders - Lists leaders of particular portions of Xubuntu development
* Team Reports - Monthly reports of team activity
*** Subpages - Monthly reports archived by year and month
* Meetings - 
* Contact Us
